text: "Michael Jackson x Mark Ronson: Diamonds Are Invincible", often shortened to just "Diamonds Are Invincible", is a song by American recording artist Michael Jackson. A mashup by Mark Ronson, it was released on August 29, 2018 on what would have been Jackson's 60th birthday. ==Background and release== On August 29, 2018, for the celebration of Jackson's 60th birthday, "Diamonds Are Invincible" premiered worldwide. The song is a mash-up composed of eight of Jackson's songs—"Don't Stop 'Til You Get Enough", "Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'", "Billie Jean", "Smooth Criminal", "Remember the Time", "Human Nature", "You Rock My World" and "The Way You Make Me Feel". ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:Mark Ronson songs Category:Mashup songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Songs written by Michael Jackson Category:Songs written by Teddy Riley Category:Songs written by Bernard Belle Category:Songs written by Steve Porcaro Category:Songs with lyrics by John Bettis Category:Songs written by Rodney Jerkins Category:Songs written by Fred Jerkins III Category:Songs written by LaShawn Daniels Category:Song recordings produced by Mark Ronson Category:Songs released posthumously Category:2018 songs
title: Diamonds Are Invincible
